bg-color.description: Component background color, which is used when the page is non-white (this parameter has been deprecated since 1.7.0, and the default parameter is transparent)
bg-color.description_zh: 组件背景颜色，在页面是非白色时会用到(1.7.0起废弃此参数，默认为transparent)

icon.description: Whether or not to display the icon when loading
icon.description_zh: 加载中时是否显示图标

icon-type.description: The type of icon when loading,

icon-color.description: icon-type is valid when circle, and the color of the animated icon is loaded
icon-color.description_zh: icon-type为circle时有效，加载中的动画图标的颜色

is-dot.description: When status is set to nomore, the content is displayed as a "●"

load-text.description: For a custom display of text, see the example above
load-text.description_zh: 自定义显示的文字，见上方说明示例

margin-top.description: Distance from the previous element, in rpx
margin-top.description_zh: 与前一个元素的距离，单位rpx

margin-bottom.description: Distance from the latter element, in rpx
margin-bottom.description_zh: 与后一个元素的距离，单位rpx

events.name: loadmore
events.description: When the status is loadmore, this event is emitted when you click on the component
events.description_zh: status为loadmore时，点击组件会发出此事件
